classRec.name: Range
classRec.description: Range This class defines a 1-dimensional continuous range of values by begin & end values. The difference between the begin and end values can be either positive or negative.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: compare
method.description: compare
method.param: value A number to check
method.return: -1 if value < min, 1 if value > max, 0 if min <= value <= max, or NaN otherwise

method.name: constrain
method.description: constrain: This function will constrain a value to be within this Range.
method.return: A number contained in this Range.

method.name: constrainRange
method.description: constrainRange: This function will reposition another Range object such that one range will completely contain the other.
method.param: rangeToConstrain The range to be repositioned.
allowShrinking If set to true, the rangeToConstrain may be resized to fit within this range.

method.name: contains
method.description: contains
method.param: value A number to check
method.return: true if the given value is within this Range

method.name: denormalize
method.description: denormalize
method.param: A number in the range [0,1]
method.return: A number within this Range

method.name: includeInRange
method.description: This function will expand the range as necessary to include the specified value.
method.param: value The value to include in the range.

method.name: normalize
method.description: normalize
method.param: value A number within this Range
method.return: A number in the range [0,1]

method.name: offset
method.description: offset: This will shift the begin and end values by a delta value.

method.name: setRange
method.description: setRange:
method.param: begin The new begin value.
end The new end value.

method.name: coverage
method.description: coverage: The coverage of a Range is defined by the positive distance from the min numeric value to the max numeric value.

method.name: min
method.description: min & max These are the numeric min,max values of the range.

field.name: begin
field.description: begin & end These values define the range of values covered by this Range object. The difference between begin & end can be either positive or negative.

classRec.name: Bounds2D
classRec.description: Bounds2D provides a flexible interface to a Rectangle-like object. The bounds values are stored as xMin,yMin,xMax,yMax instead of x,y,width,height because information is lost when storing as width,height and it causes rounding errors when using includeBounds() & includePoint(), depending on the order you include multiple points.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: Bounds2D
method.description: The default coordinates are all NaN so that includeCoords() will behave as expected after creating an empty Bounds2D.
method.param: xMin The starting X coordinate.
yMin The starting Y coordinate.
xMax The ending X coordinate.
yMax The ending Y coordinate.

method.name: centeredResize
method.description: This function will set the width and height to the new values while keeping the center point constant. This function works with both positive and negative values.

method.name: cloneBounds
method.description: This function makes a copy of the Bounds2D object.
method.return: An equivalent copy of this Bounds2D object.

method.name: constrainBounds
method.description: This function will reposition a bounds such that for the x and y dimensions of this bounds and another bounds, at least one bounds will completely contain the other bounds.
method.param: boundsToConstrain the bounds we want to constrain to be within this bounds
preserveSize if set to true, width,height of boundsToConstrain will remain the same

method.name: constrainBoundsCenterPoint
method.description: This constrains the center point of another Bounds2D to be overlapping the center of this Bounds2D.
method.param: boundsToConstrain The Bounds2D objects to constrain.

method.name: constrainPoint
method.description: This constrains a point to be within this Bounds2D.
method.param: point The point to constrain.

method.name: contains
method.description: This function supports a Bounds2D object having negative width & height, unlike the Rectangle object
method.param: x An X coordinate for a point.
y A Y coordinate for a point.
method.return: A value of true if the point is contained within this Bounds2D.

method.name: containsBounds
method.description: This function supports a Bounds2D object having negative width & height, unlike the Rectangle object
method.param: other Another Bounds2D object to check.
method.return: A value of true if the other Bounds2D is contained within this Bounds2D.

method.name: containsPoint
method.description: This function supports a Bounds2D object having negative width & height, unlike the Rectangle object
method.param: point A point to test.
method.return: A value of true if the point is contained within this Bounds2D.

method.name: copyFrom
method.description: This function copies the bounds from another Bounds2D object.
method.param: A Bounds2D object to copy the bounds from.

method.name: equals
method.description: This function compares the Bounds2D with another Bounds2D.
method.param: other Another Bounds2D to compare to
method.return: true if given Bounds2D is equivalent, even if values are undefined

method.name: getArea
method.description: Area is defined as the absolute value of width height.
method.return: The area of the bounds.

method.name: getCenterPoint
method.description: This function stores the xCenter and yCenter coordinates into a Point object.
method.param: value The Point object to store the xCenter and yCenter coordinates in.

method.name: getGridContainment
method.description: Grid numbers correspond to boxes in the following grid: 7 | 6 | 5 --+---+-- 8 | 0 | 4 --+---+-- 1 | 2 | 3 If an x,y point is contained in box 0, it is contained in the Bounds2D object. For example, if a point is contained in box 2, x is within the x-range and y < y-range.
method.param: x The x-coordinate to test for grid containment.
y The y-coordinate to test for grid containment.
method.return: The grid number from 0 to 8 that the x,y point is contained in, or NaN if none.

method.name: getHeight
method.description: The height of the bounds is defined as yMax - yMin.

method.name: getMaxPoint
method.description: This function stores the xMax and yMax coordinates in a Point object.
method.param: output The Point to store the xMax and yMax coordinates in.
method.return: The output Point object.

method.name: getMinPoint
method.description: This function stores the xMin and yMin coordinates in a Point object.
method.param: output The Point to store the xMin and yMin coordinates in.
method.return: The output Point object.

method.name: getRectangle
method.description: This function copies the values from this Bounds2D object into a Rectangle object.
method.param: output A Rectangle to store the result in.
makeSizePositive If true, this will give the Rectangle positive width/height values.
method.return: Either the given output Rectangle, or a new Rectangle if none was specified.

method.name: getWidth
method.description: The width of the bounds is defined as xMax - xMin.

method.name: getXCoverage
method.description: The xCoverage is defined as the absolute value of the width.
method.return: The xCoverage of the bounds.

method.name: getXDirection
method.description: This is equivalent to ObjectUtil.numericCompare(xMax, xMin)

method.name: getXNumericMax
method.description: The xNumericMax is defined as the maximum of xMin and xMax.
method.return: The numeric maximum x coordinate.

method.name: getXNumericMin
method.description: The xNumericMin is defined as the minimum of xMin and xMax.
method.return: The numeric minimum x coordinate.

method.name: getYCoverage
method.description: The yCoverage is defined as the absolute value of the height.
method.return: The yCoverage of the bounds.

method.name: getYDirection
method.description: This is equivalent to ObjectUtil.numericCompare(yMax, yMin)

method.name: getYNumericMax
method.description: The xNumericMax is defined as the maximum of xMin and xMax.
method.return: The numeric maximum y coordinate.

method.name: getYNumericMin
method.description: The yNumericMin is defined as the minimum of yMin and yMax.
method.return: The numeric minimum y coordinate.

method.name: includeBounds
method.description: This function will expand this Bounds2D to include another Bounds2D.
method.param: otherBounds Another Bounds2D object to include within this Bounds2D.

method.name: includeCoords
method.description: This function will expand this Bounds2D to include a point.
method.param: newX The X coordinate of a point to include in this Bounds2D.
newY The Y coordinate of a point to include in this Bounds2D.

method.name: includePoint
method.description: This function will expand this Bounds2D to include a point.
method.param: newPoint A point to include in this Bounds2D.

method.name: isEmpty
method.description: This function checks if the Bounds2D is empty.
method.return: true if the width or height is 0, or is undefined.

method.name: isUndefined
method.description: This function checks if any coordinates are undefined or infinite.
method.return: true if any coordinate is not a finite number.

method.name: makeSizePositive
method.description: For the x and y dimensions, this function swaps min and max values if min > max.

method.name: projectCoordsTo
method.description: This function projects all four coordinates of a Bounds2D object from this bounds to a destination bounds.
method.param: inputAndOutput A Bounds2D object containing coordinates to project.
toBounds The destination bounds.

method.name: projectPointTo
method.description: This function projects the coordinates of a Point object from this bounds to a destination bounds.
method.param: point The Point object containing coordinates to project.
toBounds The destination bounds.

method.name: reset
method.description: This function resets all coordinates to NaN.

method.name: setBounds
method.description: This function sets the four coordinates that define the bounds.
method.param: xMin The new xMin value.
yMin The new yMin value.
xMax The new xMax value.
yMax The new yMax value.

method.name: setCenter
method.description: This function will shift the bounds coordinates so that the xCenter and yCenter become the specified values.
method.param: xCenter The desired value for xCenter.
yCenter The desired value for yCenter.

method.name: setCenterPoint
method.description: This function will shift the bounds coordinates so that the xCenter and yCenter become the coordinates in a specified Point object.
method.param: value The Point object containing the desired xCenter and yCenter coordinates.

method.name: setHeight
method.description: This function will set the height by adjusting the yMin and yMax values relative to yCenter.
method.param: value The new height value.

method.name: setMaxCoords
method.description: This function sets the xMax and yMax values.
method.param: x The new xMax coordinate.
y The new yMax coordinate.

method.name: setMaxPoint
method.description: This function sets the xMax and yMax values from a Point object.
method.param: value The Point containing new xMax and yMax coordinates.

method.name: setMinCoords
method.description: This function sets the xMin and yMin values.
method.param: x The new xMin coordinate.
y The new yMin coordinate.

method.name: setMinPoint
method.description: This function sets the xMin and yMin values from a Point object.
method.param: value The Point containing new xMin and yMin coordinates.

method.name: setRectangle
method.description: This function sets the bounds coordinates using x, y, width and height values.
method.param: x The new xMin value.
y The new yMin value.
width The new width of the bounds.
height The new height of the bounds.

method.name: setWidth
method.description: This function will set the width by adjusting the xMin and xMax values relative to xCenter.
method.param: value The new width value.

method.name: toString
method.description: This function returns a String suitable for debugging the Bounds2D coordinates.
method.return: A String containing the coordinates of the bounds.

field.name: xMin
field.description: These are the values defining the bounds.

classRec.name: ZoomBounds
classRec.description: This object defines the data bounds of a visualization, either directly with absolute coordinates or indirectly with center coordinates and area. Screen coordinates are never directly specified in the session state.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: getDataBounds
method.description: This function will copy the internal dataBounds to another IBounds2D.
method.param: outputScreenBounds The destination.

method.name: getScreenBounds
method.description: This function will copy the internal screenBounds to another IBounds2D.
method.param: outputScreenBounds The destination.

method.name: getSessionState
method.description: The session state has two modes: absolute coordinates and centered area coordinates.
method.return: The current session state.

method.name: setBounds
method.description: This function will set all the information required to define the session state of the ZoomBounds.
method.param: dataBounds The data range of a visualization.
screenBounds The pixel range of a visualization.
useFixedAspectRatio Set this to true if you want to maintain an identical x and y data-per-pixel ratio.

method.name: setDataBounds
method.description: This function will zoom to the specified dataBounds and fix the aspect ratio if necessary.
method.param: dataBounds The bounds to zoom to.
zoomOutIfNecessary Set this to true if you are using a fixed aspect ratio and you want the resulting fixed bounds to be expanded to include the specified dataBounds.

method.name: setScreenBounds
method.description: This function will update the screenBounds and fix the aspect ratio of the dataBounds if necessary.
method.param: screenBounds The new screenBounds.
useFixedAspectRatio Set this to true if you want to maintain an identical x and y data-per-pixel ratio.

method.name: setSessionState
method.description: The session state can be specified in two ways: absolute coordinates and centered area coordinates.
method.param: The new session state.

method.name: drawFunction
method.description: This function gets called whenever Enable/Disable Pen Tool is clicked in the Context Menu. This creates a PenMouse object if there isn't one existing already. All of the necessary event listeners are added and captions are dealt with appropriately.

method.description: This function occurs when Remove All Drawings is pressed. It removes the PenMouse object and clears all of the event listeners.

method.description: This function is passed a target and checks to see if the target is an ILinkableContainer. Either a ILinkableContainer or null will be returned.

method.description: This function is called whenever the context menu is opened. The function will change the caption displayed depending upon if there is any drawings. This is also used to get the correct mouse pointer for the context menu.

method.name: handleMouseDown
method.description: This function is called when the tool is active and the left mouse button is clicked. It adds the initial mouse position cooardinate to the session state so it knows where to start from for the following lineTo's added to it.

method.name: handleMouseMove
method.description: This function is called when the tool is enabled and the mouse is being held down. It adds coordinates for lineTo to the session state in the form of ( "l,500,450" ).

method.name: constrainAndSaveCoordinates
method.description: This function constrains x,y,width,height so that this DraggablePanel is contained in its parent, then it saves the coordinates (absolute or percentage) to the sessioned properties.

method.name: constructor
method.description: A constructor cannot be defined in MXML. This function gets called as a result of calling the super class's constructor. Classes that extend DraggablePanel can override this and call super.constructor(). Any code that should execute in the constructor can be put into this function. This function should not be called directly.

method.name: copyCoordinateFromLinkableString
method.description: This function will copy a sessioned string like "75%" as a Number using the calculation "part = whole percent / 100". If the sessioned string does not have a "%" sign in it, it will be treated as an absolute coordinate.
method.param: part The LinkableString contianing the "part" value to use in the calculation.
whole The "whole" value in the calculation (parent width or height).
destinationPropertyName The name of a property to set on this object (x, y, width, or height) which is the "part" value.

method.name: copyCoordinateToLinkableString
method.description: If percentage mode is enabled, this function will save a coordinate as a sessioned string like "75%" using the calculation "percent = 100 part / whole". Otherwise, this function will save the value as an absolute coordinate.
method.param: destinationLinkableString The LinkableString to store the resulting value in.
coordinate The coordinate (x, y, width, or height) which is the "part" value.
maxCoordinate The max coordinate value (parent.width or parent.height) to use as the "whole" value.

method.name: copyCoordinatesFromSessionedProperties
method.description: This function copies the values for x,y,width,height from the corresponding sessioned properties.
method.param: singleProperty Set this to one of panelX,panelY,panelWidth,panelHeight to only update that property.

method.name: dispose
method.description: dispose This will be called when this object is no longer needed. Classes that extend this class should override this function and call super.dispose().

method.name: getResizeStatus
method.description: getResizeStatus Returns a set of Boolean values corresponding to which sides (top,left,bottom,right) should be resized.
method.param: stageX The current stage X mouse coordinate.
stageY The current stage Y mouse coordinate.
method.return: An object containing the following properties: T,L,B,R,TL,TR,BL,BR,resizing

method.name: handleParentResize
method.description: The parameter to this function is a generic Event to avoid crashing when parent is systemManager. If we make the type ResizeEvent, we may get the error "Cannot convert Event to ResizeEvent".

method.name: preinitialize
method.description: This function gets called when the preinitialize event is dispatched. Subclasses can override this method and call super.preinitialize().

method.name: resourcesChanged
method.description: This method is called when a UIComponent is constructed, and again whenever the ResourceManager dispatches a "change" Event to indicate that the localized resources have changed in some way.

field.name: panelX
field.description: panelX, panelY, panelWidth, panelHeight These are sessioned strings that can be either absolute coordinates or percentages.

classRec.name: WMSProviders
classRec.description: This class is a collection of static objects and methods regarding the valid serivces provided for WMS layers.
classRec.author: kmonico

method.name: getSRS
method.description: This function will get the SRS code for the WMS provider.

method.name: providers
method.description: END STATIC CODE BLOCK

classRec.name: WMSTile
classRec.description: This class describes a tile used by a WMS server. A tile is defined by its bounds and zoom level.
classRec.author: kmonico

method.name: WMSTile
method.param: newBounds The bounding box of the tile.
imageWidth The width of the image in pixels.
imageHeight The height of the image in pixels.
request The URLRequest for the bitmap image.
bitmapData The BitmapData for the image. This defaults to null.

method.name: cancelDownload
method.description: Cancel the URL request for this tile.

method.name: downloadImage
method.description: This function downloads an image.
method.param: resultFunction The function to call on a download success. The signature is resultFunction(event:ResultEvent, token:Object):void
faultFunction The function to call on an error. The signature is faultFunction(event:FaultEvent, token:Object):void

method.name: bitmapData
method.description: Get the bitmap data downloaded from this tile's urlLoader.

method.name: bounds
method.description: Return the bounds.

method.name: imageHeight
method.description: Return the height of the image for this tile.

method.name: imageWidth
method.description: Return the width of the image for this tile.

method.name: request
method.description: Get the URLRequest for this tile.

method.name: zoomLevel
method.description: This function gets the zoom level of this tile. By default, the zoom level is defined as the area of the bounding box divided by the pixel area of the image. The zoom level may be manually set.

method.name: bitmapData
method.description: Set the bitmapData for this WMSTile.

method.name: zoomLevel
method.description: This function sets the zoom level for this tile.

field.name: _bitmapData
field.description: This is the bitmap downloaded from the urlLoader.

field.name: _bounds
field.description: This is the bounding box of the tile.

field.name: _imageHeight
field.description: This is the height of the tile's bitmap.

field.name: _imageWidth
field.description: This is the width of the tile's bitmap.

field.name: _urlRequest
field.description: This is the URLRequest.

field.name: _urlRequestToken
field.description: This is the token associated with the HTTP get request for this specific tile.

field.name: _zoomLevel
field.description: This is the zoom level of the tile. This defaults to {area of bounds} / {area of image}

classRec.name: OpenMapQuestAerialProvider
classRec.description: This class is simply another provider to be used with ModestMaps library.
classRec.author: kmonico

classRec.name: WMSTileIndex
classRec.description: This class provides an interface to a collection of WMSTiles. The tiles are inserted into the 5-dimensional KDTree with keys of the form [xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax, zoomLevel].
classRec.author: kmonico

method.name: addTile
method.description: Insert a fully downloaded tile into the KDTree.
method.param: tile The WMSTile to insert into the tree.

method.name: getTilesWithinBounds
method.param: dataBounds The bounds of the data.

zoomLevel The zoom level of the data. This parameter should be the same for all tiles located at one zoom level. For NASA WMS, this is preferably defined as the area of the best matching bbox divided by the area of the image. For the ModestMaps services, this should be the constant zoom level provided in a Coordinate object.
method.return: An array of keys with bounds that contain the given bounds.

method.name: getTilesWithinBoundsAndZoomLevels
method.param: dataBounds The bounds of the data.
minZoomLevel The min zoom level of the data.
maxZoomLevel The max zoom level of the data.
method.return: An array of keys with bounds that contain the given bounds.

field.name: _kdTree
field.description: kdTree This is the 5-dimensional tree which holds all the tiles.

field.name: _minKDKey
field.description: This is a mapping of URLLoaders to WMSTiles. The function cancelPendingRequests iterates over these keys to close the URLLoaders. The image download handlers removes the entries from this dictionary.

classRec.name: OpenMapQuestProvider
classRec.description: This class is simply another provider to be used with ModestMaps library. MapQuest tile URLs are identical to those used by OpenStreetMap, except for the beginning of the URL.
classRec.author: kmonico

classRec.name: AbstractWMS
classRec.description: This is an abstract class containing all the implementation details relevant to each Service object for WMS.
classRec.author: kmonico

method.name: cancelPendingRequests
method.description: This function will cancel all pending requests.

method.name: dispose
method.description: This will cancel pending requests when this object is disposed.

method.name: getAllowedBounds
method.description: Return the allowed bounds.

method.name: getNumPendingRequests
method.description: Return the number of pending requests.

method.name: getProjectionSRS
method.description: Return the srs code.

method.name: handleTileDownload
method.description: This function will remove an image from _pendingImages and trigger callbacks.

method.name: requestImages
method.description: Request the images.

method.name: tileContainingBoundsDownloaded
method.description: This function will determine if a tile with identical bounds as key was already downloaded.
method.param: key The bounds object to check.
array An array of WMSTile objects.
method.return: True if there is a tile with bounds identical to key.

field.name: _allowedRequestedBounds
field.description: The bounds allowed for requests.

field.name: _currentTileIndex
field.description: This is the tiling index which contains the KDTree of the tiles and associated images.

field.name: _pendingTiles
field.description: This is an array of tiles whose images are downloading.

classRec.name: ModestMapsWMS
classRec.description: This class is a wrapper around the ModestMaps library for both Microsoft and Yahoo WMS providers.
classRec.author: kmonico

method.name: dataBoundsToTileXY
method.description: This function will convert a bounds in lat/long coordinates to tile (x, y) coordinates.
method.param: sourceBounds The source bounds.
destbounds The destination.
zoomScale The value 2^zoom where zoom is the zoom level.
method.return: The destination bounds.

method.name: downloadImage
method.description: This function will download the image data for a tile.
method.param: tile The tile whose bitmap will be downloaded.

method.name: handleImageDownload
method.description: This function is called when an image is done downloading. The image is then cached and saved.
method.param: event The result event.
token The tile.

method.name: handleImageDownloadFault
method.description: This function reports an error downloading an image. A download may fail with a valid URL.
method.param: event The fault event.
token The tile.

method.name: setReprojectedBounds
method.description: This function will reproject a bounds from a source projection to a destination projection.
method.param: sourceBounds The bounds to reproject.
destBounds The bounds for which to save the output.
sourceSRS The SRS code of the source projection.
destSRS The SRS code of the destination projection.

method.name: setTempCoordZoomLevel
method.description: This function sets the value of _tempCoord.zoom.

method.name: tileSortingComparison
method.description: This is a private method used for sorting an array of WMSTiles.

method.name: tileXYToDataBounds
method.description: This function will convert bounds from tile x,y coordinates to Latitude and Longitude coordinates.
method.param: sourceBounds The source.
destBounds The destination.
zoomScale The value 2^zoom.
method.return: The destBounds.

method.name: imageHeight
method.description: The height of an image.

method.name: imageWidth
method.description: The width of an image.

classRec.name: OnEarthProvider
classRec.description:
This class handles the requests for tiles from NASA's OnEarth WMS. The tiling service is not fully standardized and subject to change. At this time, we only support requests for BMNG images with varying months.
The OnEarth service provided by the ModestMaps library is limited and often doesn't work.
classRec.author: kmonico

method.name: changeStyleToMonth
method.description: This function will change the month.
method.param: newMonth The month to use.

method.name: downloadImage
method.description: This function will download the image data for a tile.
method.param: tile The tile whose bitmap will be downloaded.

method.name: handleImageDownload
method.description: This function is called when an image is done downloading. The image is then cached and saved.
method.param: event The result event.
token The tile.

method.name: handleImageDownloadFault
method.description: This function reports an error downloading an image.
method.param: event The fault event.
token The tile.

method.name: tileSortingComparison
method.description: This is a private method used for sorting an array of WMSTiles.

field.name: _bboxList
field.description: This is an array containing an array of bounding box values (xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax) from the regexp results. These results are saved to avoid the need to reparse the XML when the zoomlevel of the plotter has changed.

field.name: _requestURLParams
field.description: This array contains the parameters needed to fill the request URL. The even indices are constants, and the odd indices must be filled.

field.name: _stylesToMonths
field.description: This array contains the months allowed for the styles of the BMNG tiles.

field.name: _stylesToTileIndex
field.description: This is a mapping of styles to TileIndex. There should be a separate TileIndex for each style.

field.name: _tilePatternBounds
field.description: This object contains the absolute xMin, yMin, xMax, and yMax allowed for the tile pattern.

field.name: _tiledPatternXML
field.description: The list of tiled patterns for the current tile parameters.

interfaceRec.name: IURLRequestToken
interfaceRec.description: This is an interface for an asynchronous service. The invokeAsyncMethod() function invokes an asynchronous method and returns an AsyncToken which you can add IResponder objects to.

method.name: cancelRequest
method.description: This function will cancel the URL request associated with this token.

interfaceRec.name: IWeaveStatisticsService
interfaceRec.description: WSStatisticsServlet
interfaceRec.author: spurushe
sanbalag

interfaceRec.name: IWeaveDataService
interfaceRec.description: This is an interface for making asynchronous calls to a WeaveDataService.
interfaceRec.author: adufilie

interfaceRec.name: IWeaveGeometryTileService
interfaceRec.description: This is an interface for requesting tiles for a streamed geometry collection.
interfaceRec.author: adufilie

interfaceRec.name: IURLRequestUtils
interfaceRec.description: An interface for GET and POST URL requests.
interfaceRec.author: adufilie

method.name: getContent
method.description: This function will download content from a URL and call the given handler functions when it completes or a fault occurrs.
method.param: request The URL from which to get content.
asyncResultHandler A function with the following signature: function(e:ResultEvent, token:Object = null):void. This function will be called if the request succeeds.
asyncErrorHandler A function with the following signature: function(e:FaultEvent, token:Object = null):void. This function will be called if there is an error.
token An object that gets passed to the handler functions.
useCache A boolean indicating whether to use the cached images. If set to true, this function will return null if there is already a bitmap for the request.
method.return: An IURLRequestToken that can be used to cancel the request and cancel the async handlers.

method.name: getURL
method.description: This function performs an HTTP GET request and calls result or fault handlers when the request succeeds or fails.
method.param: request The URL to get.
resultHandler A function with the following signature: function(e:ResultEvent, token:Object = null):void. This function will be called if the request succeeds.
errorHandler A function with the following signature: function(e:FaultEvent, token:Object = null):void. This function will be called if there is an error.
token An object that gets passed to the handler functions.
dataFormat The value to set as the dataFormat property of a URLLoader object.
method.return: The URLLoader used to perform the HTTP GET request.

interfaceRec.name: IAsyncService
interfaceRec.description: This is an interface for an asynchronous service. The invokeAsyncMethod() function invokes an asynchronous method and returns an AsyncToken which you can add IResponder objects to.

method.name: invokeAsyncMethod
method.description: This function will invoke an asynchronous method using the given parameters object. When the method finishes, the AsyncToken returned by this function will call its responders.
method.param: methodName A String to identify which remote procedure to call.
methodParameters Either an Array or an Object to use as a list of parameters.
method.return: An AsyncToken that you can add responders to.

interfaceRec.name: IWMSService
interfaceRec.description: This is the interface for WMS services. We require each WMS service to provide at least two public functions. Any callbacks added to this service will run when a new image is downloaded.
interfaceRec.author: kmonico

method.name: cancelPendingRequests
method.description: This function will cancel all the pending requests.

method.name: clearTilingIndex
method.description: Reset the associated tiling index for this service.

method.name: getAllowedBounds
method.description: Return the bounds which contains all valid tile requests.
method.return: A Bounds2D object which covers the entire bounds. If a tile request is not contained inside this bounds, the request is invalid.

method.name: getCreditInfo
method.description: Get a string which contains copyright information for the service.
method.return: A string which contains the copyright information for the provider.

method.name: getNumPendingRequests
method.description: This function will return the number of pending requests.
method.return: The number of pending requests for this service.

method.name: getProjectionSRS
method.description: This function will return the SRS code of the tile requests.
method.return: A string corresponding to a projection SRS code. eg) EPSG:4326

method.name: getProvider
method.description: Gets the provider object.
method.return: An IMapProvider object if there is one.

method.name: requestImages
method.description: This function will make the requests for new images.
method.param: dataBounds The bounds of the data.
screenBounds The bounds of the screen. This is required to determine the appropriate zoom level.
lowerQuality A boolean indicating whether the service should request images which are one quality level lower.
method.return: An array of downloaded images. The array is filled with lower quality images followed by the requested quality. These images may overlap.

method.name: setProvider
method.description: This function will set the provider of the service.
method.param: provider The name of the provider.

classRec.name: StandardLib
classRec.description: This provides a set of useful static functions. All the functions defined in this class are pure functions, meaning they always return the same result with the same arguments, and they have no side-effects.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: asBoolean
method.description: This function attempts to derive a boolean value from different types of objects.
method.param: value An object to parse as a Boolean.

method.name: asNumber
method.description: This function will cast a value of any type to a Number, interpreting the empty string ("") and null as NaN.
method.param: value A value to cast to a Number.
method.return: The value cast to a Number, or NaN if the casting failed.

method.name: asString
method.param: value A value to cast to a String.
method.return: The value cast to a String.

method.name: constrain
method.description: This function constrains a number between min and max values.
method.param: value A value to constrain between a min and max.
min The minimum value.
max The maximum value.
method.return: If value < min, returns min. If value > max, returns max. Otherwise, returns value.

method.name: filterRange
method.description: This function filters out values outside of a given range.
method.param: value A value to filter.
min The minimum value to accept.
max The maximum value to accept.
method.return: If value is between min and max, returns value. Otherwise, returns NaN.

method.name: formatNumber
method.param: number The number to format.
formatterOrPrecision The NumberFormatter to use, or a precision value to use for the default NumberFormatter.

method.name: getNiceNumber
method.description: Code from Graphics Gems Volume 1

method.name: getNiceNumbersInRange
method.description: Code from Graphics Gems Volume 1

method.name: interpolateColor
method.param: normValue A Number between 0 and 1.
minColor A color associated with a value of 0.
maxColor A color associated with a value of 1.
method.return: An interpolated color associated with the given normValue based on the min,max color values.

method.name: normalize
method.param: value The value between min and max.
min The minimum value that corresponds to a result of 0.
max The maximum value that corresponds to a result of 1.
The normalized value between 0 and 1, or NaN if value is out of range.

method.name: numberInRange
method.description: This function tests if a Number is within a min,max range.
method.param: value A value to filter.
min The minimum value to accept.
max The maximum value to accept.
method.return: If value is between min and max, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

method.name: numberToBase
method.param: number The Number to convert to a String.
base Specifies the numeric base (from 2 to 36) to use.
zeroPad This is the minimum number of digits to return. The number will be padded with zeros if necessary.
method.return: The String representation of the number using the specified numeric base.

method.name: replace
method.description: This function performs find & replace operations on a String.
method.param: string A String to perform replacements on.
findStr A String to find.
replaceStr A String to replace occurrances of the 'findStr' String with.
moreFindAndReplace A list of additional find,replace parameters to use.
method.return: The String with all the specified replacements performed.

method.name: roundSignificant
method.description: This rounds a Number to a given number of significant digits.
method.param: value A value to round.
significantDigits The desired number of significant digits in the result.
method.return: The number, rounded to the specified number of significant digits.

method.name: scale
method.description: This function performs a linear scaling of a value from an input min,max range to an output min,max range.
method.param: inputValue A value to scale.
inputMin The minimum value in the input range.
inputMax The maximum value in the input range.
outputMin The minimum value in the output range.
outputMax The maximum value in the output range.
The input value rescaled such that a value equal to inputMin is scaled to outputMin and a value equal to inputMax is scaled to outputMax.

method.name: sign
method.description: This function returns -1 if the given value is negative, and 1 otherwise.
method.param: value A value to test.
method.return: -1 if value < 0, 1 otherwise

field.name: defaultNumberFormatter
field.description: This is the default NumberFormatter to use inside the formatNumber() function.

classRec.name: GlobalLib
classRec.description: This provides a set of static functions for use with the Weave Compiler. This set of functions allows access to almost any object, so it should be used with care when exposing these functions to users.
classRec.author: adufilie

interfaceRec.name: ICompiledObject
interfaceRec.description: This is an empty interface used to identify a compiled object type.
interfaceRec.author: adufilie

classRec.name: CompiledFunctionCall
classRec.description: This serves as a structure for storing the information required to make a function call. This is used in the Compiler class to avoid parsing tokens multiple times. To avoid function call overhead, no public functions are not defined in this class.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: constructor
method.description: This is the constructor code. The code is in a separate function because constructors do not get compiled.

field.name: compiledMethod
field.description: This is a compiled object that evaluates to a method.

field.name: compiledParams
field.description: This is an Array of CompiledObjects that must be evaluated before calling the method.

field.name: evalIndex
field.description: This is used to keep track of which compiled parameter is currently being evaluated.

field.name: evaluatedMethod
field.description: This is used to store the result of evaluating the compiledMethod before evaluating the parameters.

field.name: evaluatedParams
field.description: This is an Array of constants to use as parameters to the method. This Array is used to store the results of evaluating the compiledParams Array before calling the method.

classRec.name: CompiledConstant
classRec.description: This serves as a wrapper for a constant value to remember that it was compiled. This is used in the Compiler class to avoid parsing tokens multiple times. To avoid function call overhead, no public functions are defined in this class.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: CompiledConstant
method.param: name The name of the constant.
value The constant that was compiled.

field.name: name
field.description: This is the name of the constant. This is used for debugging/decompiling.

field.name: value
field.description: This is the constant that was compiled.

classRec.name: Compiler
classRec.description: This class can compile simple ActionScript expressions into functions.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: compileArray
method.description: This function will compile a list of expressions separated by ',' tokens.
method.param: tokens

method.name: compileBracketsAndProperties
method.param: leftBracket
rightBracket
tokens

method.name: compileFunctionCall
method.description: This function is for internal use only. This function ensures that mathFunction and evaluatedParams are new Flash variables for each wrapper function created. This returns a Function with the signature: function():
method.param: compiledMethod A compiled object that evaluates to a Function.
compiledParams An array of compiled parameters that will be evaluated when the wrapper function is called.
method.return: A CompiledObject that contains either a constant or a wrapper function that runs the functionToCompile after evaluating the compiledParams.

method.name: compileInfixOperators
method.description: This function is for internal use only. This will compile infix operators of the given type from left to right.
method.param: compiledTokens An Array of compiled tokens for an expression. No '(' ')' or ',' tokens should appear in this Array.
operatorSymbols An Array containing all the infix operator symbols to compile.

method.name: compileObjectToFunction
method.description: This function is for internal use only.
method.param: compiledObject Either a CompiledConstant or a CompiledFunctionCall.

symbolTable This is either a function that returns a variable by name or a lookup table containing custom variables and functions that can be used in the expression. These values may be changed after compiling.

ignoreRuntimeErrors If this is set to true, the generated function will ignore any Errors caused by the individual function calls in its execution. Return values from failed function calls will be treated as undefined.
method.return: A Function that takes any number of parameters and returns the result of evaluating the ICompiledObject.

method.name: compileOperator
method.param: operatorName
compiledParams

method.name: compileStringLiteral
method.description: This function is for internal use only. It assumes the string it receives is valid.
method.param: encodedString A quoted String with special characters escaped using ActionScript string literal format.
method.return: The compiled string.

method.name: compileToFunction
method.description: This function compiles an expression into a Function that evaluates using variables from a symbolTable. Strings may be surrounded by quotation marks (") and literal quotation marks are escaped by two quote marks together (""). The escape sequence for a quoted variable name to indicate a quotation mark is two quotation marks together.
method.param: expression An expression to compile.

symbolTable This is either a function that returns a variable by name or a lookup table containing custom variables and functions that can be used in the expression. These values may be changed after compiling.

ignoreRuntimeErrors If this is set to true, the generated function will ignore any Errors caused by the individual function calls in its execution. Return values from failed function calls will be treated as undefined.
method.return: A Function generated from the expression String, or null if the String does not represent a valid expression.

method.name: compileToObject
method.description: This function will compile an expression into a compiled object representing a function that takes no parameters and returns a value. This function is useful for inspecting the structure of the compiled function and decompiling individual parts.
method.param: expression An expression to parse.
method.return: A CompiledConstant or CompiledFunctionCall generated from the tokens, or null if the tokens do not represent a valid expression.

method.name: compileTokens
method.description: This function will recursively compile a set of tokens into a compiled object representing a function that takes no parameters and returns a value. Example set of input tokens: pow ( - ( - 2 + 1 ) - 4 , 3 ) - ( 4 + - 1 )
method.param: tokens An Array of tokens for an expression. This array will be modified in place.
allowEmptyExpression If tokens is an empty Array, setting this to true will return an empty compiled object instead of throwing an error.
method.return: A CompiledConstant or CompiledFunctionCall generated from the tokens, or null if the tokens do not represent a valid expression.

method.name: compileUnaryOperators
method.description: This function is for internal use only. This will compile unary operators of the given type from right to left.
method.param: compiledTokens An Array of compiled tokens for an expression. No '(' ')' or ',' tokens should appear in this Array.
operatorSymbols An Array containing all the infix operator symbols to compile.

method.name: compileVariable
method.description: This function is for internal use only. This function is necessary because variableName needs to be a new Flash variable each time a wrapper function is created.
method.param: variableName The name of the variable to get when the resulting wrapper function is evaluated.
A CompiledFunctionCall for getting the variable.

method.name: decompileObject
method.param: compiledObject A CompiledFunctionCall or CompiledConstant to decompile into an expression String.
method.return: The expression String generated from the compiledObject.

method.name: encodeString
method.description: This function surrounds a String with quotes and escapes special characters using ActionScript string literal format.
method.param: string A String that may contain special characters.
useDoubleQuotes If this is true, double-quote will be used. If false, single-quote will be used.
method.return: The given String formatted for ActionScript.

method.name: getAllLibraries
method.description: This function gets a list of all the libraries currently being used by the compiler.
method.return: A new Array containing a list of all the objects and/or classes used as libraries in the compiler.

method.name: getToken
method.description: This function is for internal use only.
method.param: expression An expression to parse.
index The starting index of the token.
method.return: The token beginning at the specified index, or null if an invalid quoted string was found.

method.name: getTokens
method.param: expression An expression string to parse.
method.return: An Array containing all the tokens found in the expression.

method.name: includeConstant
method.description: This function will add a variable to the constants available in expressions.
method.param: constantName The name of the constant.
constantValue The value of the constant.

method.name: includeLibraries
method.description: This function will include additional libraries to be supported by the compiler when compiling functions.
method.param: classesOrObjects An Array of Class definitions or objects containing functions to be supported by the compiler.

method.name: initialize
method.description: This function will initialize the operators and constants.

field.name: MAX_OPERATOR_LENGTH
field.description: This is the maximum allowed length of an operator.

field.name: OPERATOR_PREFIX
field.description: This is the prefix used for the function notation of infix operators. For example, the function notation for ( x + y ) is ( operator+(x,y) ).

field.name: WHITESPACE
field.description: This is a String containing all the characters that are treated as whitespace.

field.name: assignmentOperators
field.description: This object maps an assignment operator like "=" to its corresponding function. This object is used as a quick lookup to see if an operator is an assignment operator.

field.name: constants
field.description: This object maps the name of a predefined constant to its value.

field.name: debug
field.description: Set this to true to enable trace statements for debugging.

field.name: enableOptimizations
field.description: While this is set to true, compiler optimizations are enabled.

field.name: libraries
field.description: This is a list of objects and/or classes containing functions and constants supported by the compiler.

field.name: numberRegex
field.description: This is used to match number tokens.

field.name: operators
field.description: This object maps an operator like " to a Function with the following signature: function(x:Number, y:Number):Number If there is no function associated with the operator, it maps the operator to a value of null.

field.name: orderedOperators
field.description: This is a two-dimensional Array of operator symbols arranged in the order they should be evaluated. Each nested Array is a group of operators that should be evaluated in the same pass.

field.name: unaryOperatorSymbols
field.description: This is an Array of all the unary operator symbols.

classRec.name: DelayedAsyncResponder
classRec.description: This is an AsyncResponder that uses StageUtils.callLater() on the result and fault functions.
classRec.author: adufilie

classRec.name: URLRequestUtils
classRec.description: An all-static class containing functions for downloading URLs.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: getContent
method.description: This function will download content from a URL and call the given handler functions when it completes or a fault occurrs.
method.param: request The URL from which to get content.
asyncResultHandler A function with the following signature: function(e:ResultEvent, token:Object = null):void. This function will be called if the request succeeds.
asyncErrorHandler A function with the following signature: function(e:FaultEvent, token:Object = null):void. This function will be called if there is an error.
token An object that gets passed to the handler functions.
useCache A boolean indicating whether to use the cached images. If set to true, this function will return null if there is already a bitmap for the request.
method.return: An IURLRequestToken that can be used to cancel the request and cancel the async handlers.

method.name: getURL
method.description: This function performs an HTTP GET request and calls result or fault handlers when the request succeeds or fails.
method.param: request The URL to get.
resultHandler A function with the following signature: function(e:ResultEvent, token:Object = null):void. This function will be called if the request succeeds.
errorHandler A function with the following signature: function(e:FaultEvent, token:Object = null):void. This function will be called if there is an error.
token An object that gets passed to the handler functions.
dataFormat The value to set as the dataFormat property of a URLLoader object.
method.return: The URLLoader used to perform the HTTP GET request.

method.name: handleGetContentResult
method.description: This function gets called asynchronously from getContent(). This function may cause both result & fault handlers to occur on original CustomURLLoader object, but it is ok because nothing outside this class has access to the internal CustomURLLoader and the result and fault functions added internally do not cause problems when both are called.

field.name: _contentCache
field.description: This maps a URL to the content that was downloaded from that URL.

field.name: _requestURLToLoader
field.description: A mapping of URL Strings to CustomURLLoaders. This mapping is necessary for cached requests to return the active request.

classRec.name: Servlet
classRec.description: Servlet This is an IAsyncService interface for a servlet that takes its parameters from URL variables.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: Servlet
method.param: servletURL The URL of the servlet (everything before the question mark in a URL request).
methodParamName This is the name of the URL parameter that specifies the method to be called on the servlet.
urlRequestDataFormat This is the format to use when sending parameters to the servlet.

method.name: invokeAsyncMethod
method.description: This function makes a remote procedure call.
method.param: methodName The name of the method to call.
methodParameters The parameters to use when calling the method.
method.return: An AsyncToken generated for the call.

method.name: servletURL
method.description: This is the base URL of the servlet. The base url is everything before the question mark in a url request like the following: http://www.example.com/servlet?param=123

field.name: _methodURLParam
field.description: This is the name of the URL parameter that specifies the method to be called on the servlet.

field.name: _urlRequestDataFormat
field.description: This is the data format of the results from HTTP GET requests.

classRec.name: WeaveGeometryTileServlet
classRec.description: This is an implementation of IWeaveGeometryTileService that uses an WeaveDataServlet as the tile source.
classRec.author: adufilie

classRec.name: DelayedAsyncInvocation
classRec.description: This class contains the information required to invoke an asynchronous method. A DelayedAsyncCall object may be saved in a queue for calling later.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: addAsyncResponder
method.description: This function will create a new AsyncResponder object and pass it to the addResponder function.

method.name: emptyResultOrFaultFunction
method.description: This function does nothing. It can be used in place of a result or fault function when no function is desired.

method.name: handleFault
method.description: This function gets called when the internalAsyncToken runs its fault functions. This function will call the fault functions of the responders added to this object.

method.name: handleResult
method.description: This function gets called when the internalAsyncToken runs its result functions. This function will call the result functions of the responders added to this object.

method.name: invoke
method.description: This function will invoke the async method using the parameters previously specified.

classRec.description: This is a wrapper class for making asynchronous calls to a Weave data servlet.

classRec.description: AMF3Servlet This is an extension of Servlet that deserializes AMF3 result objects and handles special cases where an ErrorMessage is returned.

method.name: AMF3Servlet
method.param: servletURL The URL of the servlet (everything before the question mark in a URL request).
methodParamName This is the name of the URL parameter that specifies the method to be called on the servlet.

method.name: invokeAsyncMethod
method.description: This function makes a remote procedure call.
method.param: methodName The name of the method to call.
methodParameters The parameters to use when calling the method.
method.return: An AsyncToken generated for the call.

classRec.name: WeaveStatisticsServlet
classRec.description: WSStatisticsServlet
classRec.author: spurushe
sanbalag

classRec.name: LocalAsyncService
classRec.description: This class provides two-way communication between Flash applications in the form of an IAsyncService.

method.name: LocalAsyncService
method.param: receivingObject The object to receive remote commands from.
receivingObjectIsServer If true, receivingObject acts as the server and listens for the remote object acts as a client.
serverConnectionName The connection name the server uses.
clientConnectionName The connection name the client will use. If not specified, this is derived from serverConnectionName

method.name: dispose
method.description: This will call close() on the LocalConnection object.

method.name: generateCommandID
method.return: A new unique identifier for a command issued by this LocalAsyncService.

method.name: handleAsyncFault
method.description: This function is used as a fault function for an AsyncResponder. The handleFault() function will be called using the event.fault as the fault.
method.param: event The event from an AsyncToken.
token The commandID associated with an AsyncToken.

method.name: handleAsyncResult
method.description: This function is used as a result function for an AsyncResponder. The handleResult() function will be called using the event.result as the result.
method.param: event The event from an AsyncToken.
token The commandID associated with an AsyncToken.

method.name: handleFault
method.description: This function will relay a fault back to the remote LocalAsyncService.
method.param: commandID A string to identify which method invocation the result is for.
fault The fault that occurred when invoking the method.

method.name: handleResult
method.description: This function will relay a result back to the remote LocalAsyncService.
method.param: commandID A string to identify which method invocation the result is for.
result The result of the method invocation.

method.name: invokeAsyncMethod
method.param: methodName The name of the method to call.
methodParameters The parameters to use when calling the method.
method.return: An AsyncToken generated for the call.

method.name: receiveChunkedData
method.description: This function gets called by the remote LocalAsyncService. This function will receive a chunk of a serialized Array containing a name of a function of this class and a list of parameters. When all the chunks have been received for the specified commandID, the function will be called with its parameters. An example Array that would be serialized is: ["receiveCommand",[commandID,methodName,methodParameters]] In this case, the resulting function call would be: receiveCommand(commandID,methodName,methodParameters);
method.param: commandID A string to identify which method invocation the result is for when it is sent back.
chunkID An unsigned integer designating the order in which chunks should be assembled.
chunkData Part of a serialized list of parameters for the receiveCommand() function.
moreChunksFollow If this is true, it means more chunks appear after this chunkID. If false, this is the last chunkID.

method.name: receiveCommand
method.description: This function gets called by the remote LocalAsyncService. The specified method will be called with the given parameters and the return value will be sent back via a remote receiveResult() call.
method.param: commandID A string to identify which method invocation the result is for when it is sent back.
methodName The name of the method to call on receivingObject.
parameters Arguments to pass to the method.

method.name: receiveFault
method.description: This function gets called by the remote LocalAsyncService.
method.param: commandID The string identifying which method invocation the result is for.
fault The fault caused by the method invocation.

method.name: receiveResult
method.description: This function gets called by the remote LocalAsyncService.
method.param: commandID The string identifying which method invocation the result is for.
result The result of the method invocation.

method.name: send
method.description: For internal use. Sends chunks of a wrapper command to the other LocalAsyncService object.

classRec.name: CSVParser
classRec.description: CSVUtils This is an all-static class containing functions to parse and generate valid CSV files. Ported from AutoIt Script to Flex. Original author: adufilie
classRec.author: skolman
adufilie

method.name: convertRecordsToRows
method.description: This function converts an Array of Objects (compatible with DataGrid) to an Array of Arrays compatible with other functions in this class.
method.param: records An Array of Objects containing String properties.
columnOrder An optional list of column names to use in order.
allowBlankColumns If this is set to true, then the function will include all columns even if they are blank.
method.return: An Array of Arrays, the first being a header line containing all the property names.

method.name: convertRowsToRecords
method.description: This function converts an Array of Arrays to an Array of Objects compatible with DataGrid.
method.param: rows An Array of Arrays, the first being a header line containing property names
method.return: An Array of Objects containing String properties using the names in the header line.

method.name: getRecordFieldNames
method.description: This function returns a comprehensive list of all the field names defined by a list of record objects.
method.param: records An Array of record objects.
includeNullFields If this is true, fields that have null values will be included.
method.return: A comprehensive list of all the field names defined by the given record objects.

method.name: parseCSV
method.param: csvData The CSV string to parse.
parseTokens If this is true, tokens surrounded in quotes will be unquoted and escaped characters will be unescaped.
method.return: The destination Array, or a new Array if none was specified. The result of parsing the CSV string will be stored here.

classRec.name: StatisticsCache
classRec.description: This is an all-static class containing numerical statistics on columns and functions to access the statistics.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: getCount
method.param: column A column to get statistics for.
method.return: The count of the records having numeric values defined in the column.

method.name: getMax
method.param: column A column to get statistics for.
method.return: The maximum numeric value defined in the column.

method.name: getMean
method.param: column A column to get statistics for.
method.return: The mean value of all the numeric values defined in the column.

method.name: getMin
method.param: column A column to get statistics for.
method.return: The minimum numeric value defined in the column.

method.name: getRunningTotals
method.param: column A column to get statistics for.
method.return: A Dictionary that maps a IQualifiedKey to a running total numeric value, based on the order of the keys in the column.

method.name: getSquareSum
method.param: column A column to get statistics for.
method.return: The sum of the squared numeric values defined in the column.

method.name: getStandardDeviation
method.param: column A column to get statistics for.
method.return: The standard deviation of the numeric values defined in the column.

method.name: getSum
method.param: column A column to get statistics for.
method.return: The sum of all the numeric values defined in the column.

method.name: getVariance
method.param: column A column to get statistics for.
method.return: The variance of the numeric values defined in the column.

method.name: invalidateCache
method.description: This function will invalidate any cached statistical values associated with the given column.
method.param: column A column to invalidate statistics for.

method.name: validateCache
method.description: This function will validate the cached statistical values for the given column.
method.param: column A column to calculate basic statistical values for.
statsFunction The function we are interested in calling.
method.return: The cached result of the statsFunction for the given column.

field.name: cache
field.description: This maps a static function of StatisticsRepository to a Dictionary mapping an IAttributeColumn to a cached value for the function. Example: cache[getMin][column] is a cached value for the getMin function called for the given column.

field.name: cacheIsValid
field.description: This maps an IAttributeColumn to a value of true or false, indicating whether or not the cached values are valid for that column.

classRec.name: QKeyManager
classRec.description:
This class manages a global list of IQualifiedKey objects.
The getQKey() function must be used to get IQualifiedKey objects. Each QKey returned by getQKey() with the same parameters will be the same object, so IQualifiedKeys can be compared with the == operator or used as keys in a Dictionary.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: getAllKeyTypes
method.description: Get a list of all previoused key types.
method.return: An array of QKeys.

method.name: getAllQKeys
method.description: Get a list of all referenced QKeys for a given key type
method.return: An array of QKeys

method.name: getCompatibleColumnReferences
method.description: This function returns IColumnReferences that refer to key mappings to or from a given keyType.
method.param: keyType A keyType.
method.return: An Array of IColumnReference objects that are compatible with the given keyType.

method.name: getCompatibleKeyTypes
method.description: This function returns an array of key types (Strings) for which there exist mappings to or from the given key type.
method.param: keyType A key type.
method.return: A list of compatible types.

method.name: getKeyMappings
method.description: This function returns an Array of IColumnReference objects that refer to columns that provide a mapping from one key type to another.
method.param: sourceKeyType The desired input key type.
destinationKeyType The desired output key type.
method.return: An Array of IColumnReference objects that refer to columns that provide a mapping from the source key type to the destination key type.

method.name: getQKey
method.description: Get the QKey object for a given key type and key.
method.return: The QKey object for this type and key.

method.name: getQKeys
method.description: Get a list of QKey objects, all with the same key type.
method.return: An array of QKeys.

method.name: registerKeyMapping
method.description: This function should be called to register a column as a key mapping between two key types.
method.param: column The column that maps keys of one key type to corresponding keys of another type.

field.name: keyType_to_refHash_Array
field.description: This object maps a keyType to an Array of related IColumnReference objects for key mapping purposes.

field.name: refHash_to_columnReference_Array
field.description: This object maps a column reference hash value to an IColumnReference object that was previously registered. TODO: This is currently storing STRONG references to these objects. Refactor to WEAK?

classRec.name: AttributeColumnCache
classRec.description: This is a cache that maps IColumnReference hash values to IAttributeColumns. The getAttributeColumn() function is used to avoid making duplicate column requests.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: getColumn
method.description: This function will return the same IAttributeColumn for two IColumnReference objects having the same hash value. Use this function to avoid duplicate data downloads.
method.param: columnReference A reference to a column.
method.return: The column that the reference refers to.

field.name: _hashToWeakColumnRefMap
field.description: This object maps a hash value from an IColumnReference to a WeakReference that points to an IAttributeColumn.

classRec.name: ProjectionManager
classRec.description: An interface for reprojecting columns of geometries and individual coordinates.
classRec.author: adufilie
kmonico

method.name: getProjectedGeometryColumn
method.description: This function will return the projected column if a reprojection should be performed or the original column if there is no projection.
method.param: column The column containing the geometry information.
destinationProjStr The string corresponding to a projection destination.
method.return: The projected column or the original column.

method.name: getProjection
method.description: getProjection
method.param: srsCode The SRS Code of a projection.
method.return: A cached ProjProjection object for the specified SRS Code.

method.name: getProjector
method.description: This function will return an IProjector object that can be used to reproject points.
method.param: sourceSRS The SRS code of the source projection.
destinationSRS The SRS code of the destination projection.
method.return: An IProjector object that reprojects from sourceSRS to destinationSRS.

method.name: initializeProjections
method.description: end static code block

method.name: projectionExists
method.description: This function will check if a projection is defined for a given SRS code.
method.param: srsCode The SRS code of the projection.
method.return: A boolean indicating true if the projection is defined and false otherwise.

method.name: transformBounds
method.description: This function will transform bounds from the sourceSRS to the destinationSRS. The resulting bounds are an approximation.
method.param: sourceSRS The SRS code of the source projection.
destinationSRS The SRS code of the destination projection.
inputAndOutput The bounds to transform. This is then used as the return value.
xGridSize The number of points in the grid in the x direction.
yGridSize The number of points in the grid in the y direction.
method.return: The transformed bounds, inputAndOutput.

method.name: transformPoint
method.description: This function will transform a point from the sourceSRS to the destinationSRS.
method.param: sourceSRS The SRS code of the source projection.
destinationSRS The SRS code of the destination projection.
inputAndOutput The point to transform. This is then used as the return value.
method.return: The transformed point, inputAndOutput, or null if the transform failed.

field.name: _tempPoint
field.description: _tempInputPoint This is a temporary object used only in transformBounds.

field.name: _tempProjPoint
field.description: _tempProjPoint This is a temporary object used for single point transformations.

field.name: cache
field.description: This is a multi-dimensional lookup: unprojectedColumn -> Object, destinationSRS -> ProxyColumn Example: cache[column][destinationSRS] is a ProxyColumn containing geometries reprojected to the given SRS.

field.name: srsToProjMap
field.description: srsToProjMap This maps an SRS Code to a cached ProjProjection object for that code.

field.name: uniqueIDToTokenMap
field.description: uniqueIDToTokenMap This maps a unique ID (generated when a request is made to download from a URL through this class) to an AsyncToken associated with it.

method.name: toShortString
method.description: APIMethod: toShortString Return a short string version of the point. Return: {String} Shortened String representation of Proj4js.Point object. (ex. "5, 42")

method.name: toString
method.description: APIMethod: toString Return a readable string version of the point Return: {String} String representation of Proj4js.Point object. (ex. "x=5,y=42")

field.name: projParams
field.description: Property: title The title to describe the projection

field.name: readyToUse
field.description: Property: readyToUse Flag to indicate if initialization is complete for this Proj object

field.name: datum
field.description: Property: datum The datum specified for the projection

field.name: projName
field.description: Property: projName The projection class for this projection, e.g. lcc (lambert conformal conic, or merc for mercator. These are exactly equicvalent to their Proj4 counterparts.

field.name: units
field.description: Property: units The units of the projection. Values include 'm' and 'degrees' / Property: units The units of the projection. Values include 'm' and 'degrees'

packageRec.name: org.openscales.proj4as.proj.null
packageRec.description:
NAME NEW ZEALAND MAP GRID
PURPOSE: Transforms input longitude and latitude to Easting and Northing for the New Zealand Map Grid projection. The longitude and latitude must be in radians. The Easting and Northing values will be returned in meters.
ALGORITHM REFERENCES
1. Department of Land and Survey Technical Circular 1973/32 http://www.linz.govt.nz/docs/miscellaneous/nz-map-definition.pdf
2. OSG Technical Report 4.1 http://www.linz.govt.nz/docs/miscellaneous/nzmg.pdf
IMPLEMENTATION NOTES
The two references use different symbols for the calculated values. This implementation uses the variable names similar to the symbols in reference [1].
The alogrithm uses different units for delta latitude and delta longitude. The delta latitude is assumed to be in units of seconds of arc x 10^-5. The delta longitude is the usual radians. Look out for these conversions.
The algorithm is described using complex arithmetic. There were three options: find and use a Javascript library for complex arithmetic write my own complex library expand the complex arithmetic by hand to simple arithmetic
This implementation has expanded the complex multiplication operations into parallel simple arithmetic operations for the real and imaginary parts. The imaginary part is way over to the right of the display; this probably violates every coding standard in the world, but, to me, it makes it much more obvious what is going on.
The following complex operations are used: - addition - multiplication - division - complex number raised to integer power - summation
A summary of complex arithmetic operations: (from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Complex_arithmetic) addition: (a + bi) + (c + di) = (a + c) + (b + d)i subtraction: (a + bi) - (c + di) = (a - c) + (b - d)i multiplication: (a + bi) x (c + di) = (ac - bd) + (bc + ad)i division: (a + bi) / (c + di) = [(ac + bd)/(cc + dd)] + [(bc - ad)/(cc + dd)]i
The algorithm needs to calculate summations of simple and complex numbers. This is implemented using a for-loop, pre-loading the summed value to zero.
The algorithm needs to calculate theta^2, theta^3, etc while doing a summation. There are three possible implementations: - use Math.pow in the summation loop - except for complex numbers - precalculate the values before running the loop - calculate theta^n = theta^(n-1) theta during the loop This implementation uses the third option for both real and complex arithmetic.
For example psi_n = 1; sum = 0; for (n = 1; n <=6; n++) { psi_n1 = psi_n psi; // calculate psi^(n+1) psi_n = psi_n1; sum = sum + A[n] psi_n; }
TEST VECTORS
NZMG E, N: 2487100.638 6751049.719 metres NZGD49 long, lat: 172.739194 -34.444066 degrees
NZMG E, N: 2486533.395 6077263.661 metres NZGD49 long, lat: 172.723106 -40.512409 degrees
NZMG E, N: 2216746.425 5388508.765 metres NZGD49 long, lat: 169.172062 -46.651295 degrees
Note that these test vectors convert from NZMG metres to lat/long referenced to NZGD49, not the more usual WGS84. The difference is about 70m N/S and about 10m E/W.
These test vectors are provided in reference [1]. Many more test vectors are available in http://www.linz.govt.nz/docs/topography/topographicdata/placenamesdatabase/nznamesmar08.zip which is a catalog of names on the 260-series maps.
EPSG CODES
NZMG EPSG:27200 NZGD49 EPSG:4272
http://spatialreference.org/ defines these as Proj4js.defs["EPSG:4272"] = "+proj=longlat +ellps=intl +datum=nzgd49 +no_defs "; Proj4js.defs["EPSG:27200"] = "+proj=nzmg +lat_0=-41 +lon_0=173 +x_0=2510000 +y_0=6023150 +ellps=intl +datum=nzgd49 +units=m +no_defs ";
LICENSE Copyright: Stephen Irons 2008 Released under terms of the LGPL as per: http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html

classRec.name: HeatMapDataGridColumnRenderer

classRec.author: abaumann A WeaveDataGridColumn can have a custom renderer created for it that allows a visualization to be put into each cell rather than just text that shows the data value. This class creates a heat map.

classRec.name: StringLookup
classRec.description: This provides a reverse lookup of String values in an IAttributeColumn.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: compareNumberAndStringValues
method.description: This function uses _stringToNumberMap to get a numeric value to compare for each string value. If the numeric compare returns zero, it does a string compare on the string values instead.

method.name: createLookupTable
method.description: This function will initialize the string lookup table and list of unique strings.

method.name: getKeysFromString
method.param: stringValue A string value existing in the internal column.
method.return: An Array of keys that map to the given string value in the internal column.

method.name: getNumberFromString
method.param: stringValue A string value existing in the internal column.
method.return: The Number value associated with the String value from the internal column.

method.name: handleInternalColumnChange
method.description: This function gets called when the referenced column changes.

method.name: uniqueStrings
method.description: This is a list of the unique strings of the internal column.

field.name: _stringToKeysMap
field.description: This object maps a String value from the internal column to an Array of keys that map to that value.

field.name: _stringToNumberMap
field.description: This object maps a String value from the internal column to the Number value corresponding to that String values in the internal column.

field.name: _uniqueStringValues
field.description: This keeps track of a list of unique string values contained in the internal column.

method.name: containsKey
method.param: key A key to test.
method.return: true if the key exists in this IKeySet.

method.name: getValueFromKey
method.description: This function returns the corresponding numeric or string value depending on the dataType parameter and the numericMode setting.

method.name: invalidate
method.description: This function gets called when csvData changes.

method.name: validate
method.description: This function generates three Vectors from the CSV data: _keys, _stringValues, _numberValues

method.name: keys
method.description: This function returns the list of String values from the first column in the CSV data.

field.name: csvData
field.description: This should contain a two-column CSV with the first column containing the keys and the second column containing the values.

field.name: dirty
field.description: This value is true when the data changed and the lookup tables need to be recreated.

field.name: keyType
field.description: This is the key type of the first column in the csvData.

field.name: numericMode
field.description: If this is set to true, the data will be parsed as numbers to produce the numeric data. If this is set to false, the numeric data for the column will be the row index.

field.description: This maps keys to index values in the _uniqueStrings vector. This effectively stores the column data.
