classRec.name: ProxyColumn
classRec.description: ProxyColumn This class is a proxy (a wrapper) for another attribute column.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: containsKey
method.param: key A key to test.
method.return: true if the key exists in this IKeySet.

method.name: dispose
method.description: dispose This function should be called when the ProxyColumn is no longer in use. All existing pointers to objects should be set to null so they can be garbage collected.

method.name: getMetadata
method.description: The metadata specified by ProxyColumn will override the metadata of the internal column. First, this function checks thet ProxyColumn metadata. If the value is null, it checks the metadata of the internal column.
method.param: propertyName The name of a metadata property to get.
method.return: The metadata value of the ProxyColumn or the internal column, ProxyColumn metadata takes precendence.

method.name: getValueFromKey
method.description: The functions below serve as wrappers for matching function calls on the internalAttributeColumn.

method.name: setMetadata
method.description: This function updates the proxy metadata.
method.param: metadata New metadata for the proxy.

method.name: internalNonProxyColumn
method.description: internalNonProxyColumn As long as internalAttributeColumn is a ProxyColumn, this function will keep traversing internalAttributeColumn until it reaches an IAttributeColumn that is not a ProxyColumn.
method.return: An attribute column that is not a ProxyColumn, or null.

method.name: keys
method.return: the keys associated with this column.

field.name: _internalColumn
field.description: internalAttributeColumn This is the IAttributeColumn object contained in this ProxyColumn.

field.name: proxyID
field.description: proxyID This is a globally unique ID for this ProxyColumn object.

field.name: undefinedColumn
field.description: undefinedColumn This object can be used as an alternative to a null return value for a function returning a ProxyColumn.

classRec.name: EquationColumn
classRec.description: This is a column of data derived from an equation with variables.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: EquationColumn
method.description: end static code block

method.name: containsKey
method.param: key A key to test.
method.return: true if the key exists in this IKeySet.

method.name: getMetadata
method.description: This function intercepts requests for dataType and title metadata and uses the corresponding linkable variables.
method.param: propertyName A metadata property name.
method.return: The requested metadata value.

method.name: getValueFromKey
method.return: The result of the compiled equation evaluated at the given record key.

method.name: handleDataTypeChange
method.description: This function gets called when dataType changes and sets _defaultDataType.

method.name: handleEquationChange
method.description: This function gets called when the equation changes.

method.name: handleVariablesChange
method.description: This function gets called when the variables change.

method.name: handleVariablesListChange
method.description: This function gets called when a variable is added, removed, or reordered. The first column in the list will be used to get keys.

method.name: requestVariable
method.description: This function creates an object in the variables LinkableHashMap if it doesn't already exist. If there is an existing object associated with the specified name, it will be kept if it is the specified type, or replaced with a new instance of the specified type if it is not.
method.param: name The identifying name of a new or existing object.
classDef The Class of the desired object type.
method.return: The object associated with the requested name of the requested type, or null if an error occurred.

method.name: setMetadata
method.description: This function will store an individual metadata value in the metadata linkable variable.
method.param: propertyName
value

method.name: keys
method.return: The keys associated with this EquationColumn.

field.name: _columnToGetKeysFrom
field.description: This is the column to get keys and keyType from if keyColumn is undefined.

field.name: _constantResult
field.description: This value is set to the result of the function when it compiles into a constant.

field.name: _defaultDataType
field.description: This is the Class corresponding to dataType.value.

field.name: _equationIsConstant
field.description: This flag is set to true when the equation evaluates to a constant.

field.name: _equationResultCache
field.description: This is a mapping from keys to cached data values.

field.name: _lastError
field.description: This is the last error thrown from the compiledEquation.

field.name: compiledEquation
field.description: This is the function compiled from the equation.

field.name: equation
field.description: This is the equation that will be used in getValueFromKey().

field.name: in_getValueFromKey
field.description: This is true while code inside getValueFromKey is executing.

field.name: keyColumn
field.description: This is the column to get keys from.

field.name: metadata
field.description: This holds the metadata for the column.

field.name: variables
field.description: This is a list of named variables made available to the compiled equation.

classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: containsKey

method.return: true if the key exists in this IKeySet.

method.name: getValueFromKey
method.description: getValueFromKey
method.param: key A key of the type specified by keyType.
method.return: The value associated with the given key.

method.name: internalColumn

classRec.name: EquationColumnLib
classRec.description: EquationColumnLib This class contains static functions that access values from IAttributeColumn objects. Many of the functions in this library use the static variable 'currentRecordKey'. This value should be set before calling a function that uses it.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: applyColorRamp
method.param: ramp A ColorRamp to apply to a normalized value.
normValueOrColumn Either an IAttributeColumn to get a normalized value from, or a normalized value between 0 and 1.
method.return: The result of ramp.getColorFromNorm() called on the normalized value.

method.name: cast
method.param: value A value to cast.
newType Either a qualifiedClassName or a Class object referring to the type to cast the value as.

method.name: getBoolean
method.description: This function uses currentRecordKey when retrieving a value from a column if no key is specified.
method.param: object An IAttributeColumn or an ILinkableVariable to get a value from.
key A key to get the Number for.
method.return: The value of the object, cast to a Boolean.

method.name: getKey
method.description: This function calls column.getValueFromKey(currentRecordKey, IQualifiedKey)
method.param: column A column, or null if you want the currentRecordKey to be returned.
method.return: The value at the current record in the column cast as an IQualifiedKey.

method.name: getNorm
method.description: This function uses currentRecordKey when retrieving a value from a column if no key is specified.
method.param: column A column to get a value from.
key A key to get the Number for.
method.return: The Number corresponding to the given key, normalized to be between 0 and 1.

method.name: getNumber
method.description: This function uses currentRecordKey when retrieving a value from a column if no key is specified.
method.param: object An IAttributeColumn or an ILinkableVariable to get a value from.
key A key to get the Number for.
method.return: The value of the object, cast to a Number.

method.name: getReferencedColumn
method.return: columnReference.getAttributeColumn()

method.name: getString
method.description: This function uses currentRecordKey when retrieving a value from a column if no key is specified.
method.param: object An IAttributeColumn or an ILinkableVariable to get a value from.
key A key to get the Number for.
method.return: The value of the object, cast to a String.

method.name: getValue
method.description: This function uses currentRecordKey when retrieving a value from a column.
method.param: object An IAttributeColumn or an ILinkableVariable to get a value from.
dataType Either a Class object or a String containing the qualified class name of the desired value type.
method.return: The value of the object, optionally cast to the requested dataType.

method.name: getValueFromKey
method.description: This function calls IAttributeColumn.getValueFromKey(key, dataType).
method.param: column An IAttributeColumn to get a value from.
key A key to get the value for.
method.return: The result of calling column.getValueFromKey(key, dataType).

field.name: QKey
field.description: This is a macro for IQualifiedKey that can be used in equations.

field.name: currentRecordKey
field.description: This value should be set before calling any of the functions below that get values from IAttributeColumns.

field.name: _defaultValue

classRec.name: BinnedColumn
classRec.description: A binned column maps a record key to a bin key.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: deriveStringFromNumber
method.description: From a bin index, this function returns the name of the bin.
method.param: value A bin index
method.return: The name of the bin

method.name: getKeysFromBinIndex
method.description: This function gets a list of keys in a bin.
method.param: binIndex The index of the bin to get the keys from.
method.return: An Array of keys in the specified bin.

method.name: getKeysFromBinName
method.description: This function gets a list of keys in a bin.
method.param: binIndex The name of the bin to get the keys from.
method.return: An Array of keys in the specified bin.

method.name: getMetadata
method.description: This number overrides the min,max metadata values.
method.param: propertyName The name of a metadata property.
method.return: The value of the specified metadata property.

method.name: getValueFromKey
method.description: This function returns different results depending on the dataType. Supported types: default -> IBinClassifier that matches the given record key Number -> bin index for the given record key String -> bin name for the given record key Array -> list of keys in the same bin as the given record key
method.param: key A record identifier.
dataType The requested return type.
method.return: If the specified dataType is supported, a value of that type. Otherwise, the default return value for the given record key.

method.name: invalidateBins
method.description: This function sets the dirty flag to true to invalidate the bins.

method.name: validateBins
method.description: This function generates bins using the binning definition and the internal column, and also saves lookups for mapping between bins and keys.

method.name: derivedBins
method.description: This contains the bins generated from the binningDefinition. Derived values don't need to appear in the session state. These bins are provided for convenience only and should not be modified.

method.name: largestBinSize
method.description: This is the largest number of records in any of the bins.

method.name: numberOfBins
method.description: This is the number of bins that have been generated by the binning definition using with the internal column.

field.name: _dirty
field.description: This flag is true when the derivedBins are invalid.

field.name: binningDefinition
field.description: This defines how to generate the bins for this BinnedColumn. This is used to generate the derivedBins.

classRec.name: SortedColumn
classRec.description: This is a wrapper for another column that provides sorted keys.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: invalidateKeys
method.description: This function will invalidate the sorted keys.

method.name: sortByNumericValue
method.description: This function is used to sort a list of keys.
method.param: key1 The first key identifying a Number to compare.
key2 The second key identifying a Number to compare.
method.return: The compare result used to sort a list of keys.

method.name: validateKeys
method.description: This function will, if necessary, sort the keys based on the numeric value of the internal column.

method.name: keys
method.description: This function returns the unique strings of the internal column.
method.return: The keys this column defines values for.

field.name: _keys
field.description: This is used to store the sorted list of keys.

field.name: _sortAscending
field.description: This variable is used to tell the sortByNumericValue() function how to sort.

field.name: ascending
field.description: This is an option to sort the column in ascending or descending order.

classRec.name: ReprojectedGeometryColumn
classRec.description: This column provides reprojected geometries for an internal geometry column.

method.name: updateReprojectedColumn
method.description: This function updates the private _reprojectedColumn variable.

field.name: projectionSRS
field.description: This is the SRS code of the destination projection when reprojecting geometries from the internal column.

method.name: handleFault
method.description: This function is called when there is an error downloading an image.

field.name: _urlToImageMap
field.description: This is the image cache.

classRec.name: StringLookupColumn
classRec.description: This column maps a String to an Array of keys that have matching String values in the referenced column.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: compareStringKeys
method.description: This function uses _stringToNumberMap to get a numeric value to compare for each string value. If the numeric compare returns zero, it does a string compare on the string values instead.

method.name: containsKey
method.param: key A key to test.
method.return: true if the key exists in this IKeySet.

method.name: createLookupTable
method.description: This function will initialize the string lookup table and list of unique strings.

method.name: getStringLookupKeyFromInternalColumnKey
method.description: This function gets a key that can be passed to getValueFromKey to look up other internal column keys having the same internalColumn String value.
method.param: internalColumnKey A record identifier used in the internal column.
method.return: The IQualifiedKey that can be used to pass to getValueFromKey to look up other internal column keys having the same internalColumn String value.

method.name: getValueFromKey
method.param: stringValue A string value existing in the internal column.
dataType A requested return type.
method.return: If dataType is not specified, returns an Array of IQualifiedKeys that map to the given string value in the internal column.

method.name: handleInternalColumnChange
method.description: This function gets called when the referenced column changes.

method.name: keys
method.description: This function returns the unique strings of the internal column.
method.return: The keys this column defines values for.

field.name: _keyLookup
field.description: This object maps a String value from the internal column to an Array of keys that map to that value.

field.name: _numberLookup
field.description: This object maps a String value from the internal column to the Number value corresponding to that String values in the internal column.

field.name: _uniqueStringKeys
field.description: This keeps track of a list of unique string values contained in the internal column.

classRec.name: RunningTotalColumn

classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: getValueFromKey
method.param: key A key existing in the internal column.
dataType A requested return type.
method.return: The running total numeric value at the specified key.

classRec.name: BinClassifierCollection
classRec.description: This object contains an ordered, named list of IBinClassifier objects. It also represents a compound IBinClassifier object which is the union of all the internal IBinClassifiers.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: contains
method.description: A BinClassifierCollection is the union of a list of IBinClassifier objects.
method.param: value A data value to test.
method.return: A value of true if any of the internal IBinClassifier objects return true from their contains() functions.

method.name: copyBinClassifier
method.description: This function will copy the session state of a bin classifier into a new object in this BinClassifierCollection under the given name.
method.param: newName A name for the new object to be created.
classifierToCopy A bin classifier to copy the session state from.

method.name: getBinClassifierFromDataValue
method.param: value A data value to test.
method.return: The IBinClassifier containing this value, or null if no bin contains the value.

method.name: getBinIndexFromDataValue
method.param: value A data value to test.
method.return: Index of bin containing this value, or NaN if no bin contains the value.

method.name: getBinNameFromDataValue
method.param: value A data value to test.
method.return: The name of the IBinClassifier containing this value, or null if no bin contains the value.

method.name: invalidateBins

method.name: validateLocalArrays
method.description: This function will update the local arrays if necessary.

field.name: _bins
field.description: This is a private copy of the last getObjects() result.

field.name: _names
field.description: This is a private copy of the last getNames() result.

classRec.name: DynamicPlotter
classRec.description: This is a wrapper for another IPlotter.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: drawBackground
method.description: This function draws the background graphics for this plotter, if applicable. An example background would be the origin lines of an axis.
method.param: dataBounds The data coordinates that correspond to the given screenBounds.
screenBounds The coordinates on the given sprite that correspond to the given dataBounds.
destination The sprite to draw the graphics onto.

method.name: drawPlot
method.description: Draws the graphics for a record onto a sprite.
method.param: recordKey The key of a data record.
dataBounds The data coordinates that correspond to the given screenBounds.
screenBounds The coordinates on the given sprite that correspond to the given dataBounds.
destination The sprite to draw the graphics onto.

method.name: getBackgroundDataBounds
method.description: This function returns a Bounds2D object set to the data bounds associated with the background.
method.param: outputDataBounds A Bounds2D object to store the result in.

method.name: getDataBoundsFromRecordKey
method.description: This function returns a Bounds2D object set to the data bounds associated with the given record key.
method.param: recordKey The key of a data record.
outputDataBounds A Bounds2D object to store the result in.

method.name: handleInternalObjectChange
method.description: This function gets called when the internal plotter changes.

method.name: keySet
method.description: This is the set of keys relevant to this IPlotter.
method.return: The record keys that can be passed to the drawRecord() and getDataBoundsFromRecordKey() functions.

method.name: spatialCallbacks
method.description: This is an interface for adding callbacks that get called when any spatial properties of the plotter change. Spatial properties are those that affect the data bounds of visual elements. Whenever these callbacks get called, data bounds values returned from getDataBoundsFromRecordKey() become invalid.

field.name: _spatialCallbacks
field.description: This CallbackCollection is defined in this class so any callbacks added to it will be transferred to any new plotter created internally.

classRec.name: AbstractPlotter
classRec.description: This is a base implementation for an IPlotter.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: AbstractPlotter
method.param: columnToGetKeysFrom The column that the IKeySet object uses to get keys from.

method.name: addRecordGraphicsToTempShape
method.description: This function may be defined by a class that extends AbstractPlotter to use the basic template code in AbstractPlotter.drawPlot().

method.name: dispose
method.description: This function gets called when the SessionManager disposes of this sessioned object.

method.name: drawBackground
method.description: This function draws the background graphics for this plotter, if applicable. An example background would be the origin lines of an axis.
method.param: dataBounds The data coordinates that correspond to the given screenBounds.
screenBounds The coordinates on the given sprite that correspond to the given dataBounds.
destination The sprite to draw the graphics onto.

method.name: drawPlot
method.description:
This function must be defined with override by classes that extend AbstractPlotter.
Draws the graphics for a list of records onto a sprite.
method.param: recordKeys The list of keys that identify which records should be used to generate the graphics.
dataBounds The data coordinates that correspond to the given screenBounds.
screenBounds The coordinates on the given sprite that correspond to the given dataBounds.
destination The sprite to draw the graphics onto.

method.name: getBackgroundDataBounds
method.description: This function returns a Bounds2D object set to the data bounds associated with the background.
method.return: A Bounds2D object specifying the background data bounds.

method.name: getDataBoundsFromRecordKey
method.description:
This function must be implemented by classes that extend AbstractPlotter.
This function returns a Bounds2D object set to the data bounds associated with the given record key.
method.param: key The key of a data record.
outputDataBounds A Bounds2D object to store the result in.
method.return: An Array of Bounds2D objects that make up the bounds for the record.

method.name: getReusableBounds
method.description: This function gets a Bounds2D object that can only be used until the spatial callbacks run. When the spatial callbacks run, these objects will be reclaimed to be used again later. It is recommended to use this function only for implementing the getDataBoundsFromRecordKey() and getBackgroundDataBounds() functions.
method.param: xMin Value to set for Bounds2D.xMin
yMin Value to set for Bounds2D.yMin
xMax Value to set for Bounds2D.xMax
yMax Value to set for Bounds2D.yMax
method.return: A Bounds2D object that can be used in getDataBoundsFromRecordKey() and getBackgroundDataBounds().

method.name: newNonSpatialProperty
method.description: This function creates a new registered linkable child of the plotter.

method.name: newSpatialProperty
method.description: This function creates a new registered linkable child of the plotter whose callbacks will also trigger the spatial callbacks.
method.return: A new instance of the specified class that is registered as a spatial property.

method.name: registerNonSpatialProperties
method.description: This function will cause the spatialCallbacks and plotter callbacks to trigger when the given sessioned properties run their callbacks.
method.param: firstProperty A sessioned object that is a spatial property of the plotter.
moreProperties More sessioned objects that are spatial properties of the plotter.

method.name: registerNonSpatialProperty
method.description: This function registers a linkable child of the plotter.
method.param: child A sessioned object that is a non-spatial property of the plotter.

method.name: registerSpatialProperties
method.description: This function will cause the spatialCallbacks and plotter callbacks to trigger when the given sessioned properties run their callbacks.
method.param: firstProperty A sessioned object that is a spatial property of the plotter.
moreProperties More sessioned objects that are spatial properties of the plotter.

method.name: registerSpatialProperty
method.description: This function registers a linkable child of the plotter whose callbacks will also trigger the spatial callbacks.
method.param: child An object to register as a spatial property.
method.return: The child object.

method.name: returnPooledObjects
method.description: This function gets called as the first spatial callback. All Bounds2D objects that were returned by getReusableBounds() will return to the ObjectPool.

method.name: setKeySource
method.description: This function can be used by classes that extend AbstractPlotter to control the results of the get keySet() function. Since all IAttributeColumns implement IKeySet, a column can be set as the source of an AbstractPlotter's keys.
method.param: source An object that implements IKeySet (Note: IAttributeColumn implements this)

method.name: keySet
method.return: An IKeySet interface to the record keys that can be passed to the drawRecord() and getDataBoundsFromRecordKey() functions.

method.name: spatialCallbacks
method.description: This is an interface for adding callbacks that get called when any spatial properties of the plotter change. Spatial properties are those that affect the data bounds of visual elements.

field.name: _filteredKeySet
field.description: This variable is returned by get keySet().

field.name: _spatialCallbacks
field.description: This variable should not be set manually. It cannot be made constant because we cannot guarantee that it will be initialized before other properties are initialized, which means it may be null when someone wants to call registerSpatialProperty().

field.name: pooledObjects
field.description: This is the list of Bounds2D objects that were returned by getReusableBounds(). These objects will be returned to the ObjectPool when spatialCallbacks run.

classRec.name: CompoundPlotter
classRec.description:
A CompoundPlotter combines multiple plotters into one. For example, a BarChartPlotter and a CircleGlyphPlotter can be combined in a compound plotter that generates, given a record key, a bar with a circle on top.
CompoundPlotter is only recommended when there is a one-to-one mapping of record keys to graphics objects. A histogram is not recommended to be included in a CompoundPlotter because multiple record keys map to the same graphics object.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: CompoundPlotter
method.description: The constructor will set the protected internalPlotter variable to a new instance of the specified class.
method.param: internalPlotterClass This parameter is required. This shouold be a class that implements IPlotter.

method.description: Draws the graphics onto BitmapData.

method.description: This function returns a Bounds2D object set to the data bounds associated with the given record key.
method.param: key The key of a data record.
outputDataBounds A Bounds2D object to store the result in.

field.name: plotters
field.description: This is an ordered list of plotters to combine.

classRec.name: AbstractSimplifiedPlotter
classRec.description: The purpose of this class is to simplify the session state of an IPlotter object. For example, a Histogram or a Bar Chart can be created by simplifying a RectanglePlotter, hiding the hard-coded part of the session state and making only a few sessioned properties public.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: AbstractSimplifiedPlotter
method.description: The constructor will set the protected internalPlotter variable to a new instance of the specified class.
method.param: internalPlotterClass This parameter is required. This shouold be a class that implements IPlotter.

method.description: Draws the graphics onto BitmapData.

method.return: A Bounds2D object specifying the background data bounds.

method.name: getDataBoundsFromRecordKey

method.param: key The key of a data record.
method.return: An Array of Bounds2D objects that specify the data bounds of the record.

method.name: init
method.description: This will initialize the internal plotter and link it with the AbstractSimplifiedPlotter.

method.name: internalPlotter
method.description: This is the internal plotter that is being simplified by a class that extends AbstractSimplifiedPlotter.

classRec.name: ColorBinLegendPlotter
classRec.description: This plotter displays a legend for a ColorColumn. If the ColorColumn contains a BinnedColumn, a list of bins with their corresponding colors will be displayed. If not a continuous color scale will be displayed. By default this plotter links to the static color column, but it can be linked to another by changing or removing the dynamicColorColumn.staticName value.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: internalColorColumn
method.description: This accessor function provides convenient access to the internal ColorColumn. The public session state is defined by dynamicColorColumn.

field.name: dynamicColorColumn
field.description: This plotter is specifically implemented for visualizing a ColorColumn. This DynamicColumn only allows internal columns of type ColorColumn.

field.name: lineStyle
field.description: This is the line style used to draw the outline of the shape.

field.name: shapeSize
field.description: This is the radius of the circle, in screen coordinates.

classRec.name: KeySet
classRec.description: This class contains a set of IQualifiedKeys and functions for adding/removing keys from the set.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: addKeys
method.description: Adds a vector of additional keys to the set.
method.param: additionalKeys A list of keys to add to this set.
method.return: true if the set changes as a result of calling this function.

method.name: clearKeys
method.description: Clear the current set of keys.
method.return: true if the set changes as a result of calling this function.

method.name: containsKey
method.param: key A IQualifiedKey object to check.
method.return: true if the given key is included in the set.

method.name: removeKeys
method.description: Removes a vector of additional keys to the set.
method.param: unwantedKeys A list of keys to remove from this set.
method.return: true if the set changes as a result of calling this function.

method.name: replaceKeys
method.description: Overwrite the current set of keys.
method.param: newKeys An Array of IQualifiedKey objects.
method.return: true if the set changes as a result of calling this function.

method.name: setSessionState
method.description: This function sets the session state for the KeySet.
method.param: value A CSV-formatted String where each row is a keyType followed by a list of key strings of that keyType.

method.name: updateKeys
method.description: This is the first callback that runs when the KeySet changes. The keys will be updated based on the session state.

method.name: updateSessionState
method.description: This function will derive the session state from the IQualifiedKey objects in the keys array.

method.name: keys
method.description: A list of keys included in this KeySet.

field.name: _currentlyUpdating
field.description: This flag is used to avoid recursion while the keys are being synchronized with the session state.

field.name: _keyIndex
field.description: This object maps keys to index values

field.name: _keys
field.description: This maps index values to IQualifiedKey objects

classRec.name: KeyFilter
classRec.description: This class is used to include and exclude IQualifiedKeys from a set.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: containsKey
method.param: key A key to test.
method.return: true if this filter includes the key, false if the filter excludes it.

method.name: replaceKeys
method.description: This replaces the included and excluded keys in the filter with the parameters specified.

classRec.name: ShpHeader

method.description: Constructor.

field.name: boundsM
field.description: The minimum (Point.x) and maximum M (Point.y) value expected to be encountered in this file.

field.description: The cartesian bounding box of all Shape records contained in this file.

field.name: boundsZ
field.description: The minimum (Point.x) and maximum Z (Point.y) value expected to be encountered in this file.

field.name: fileLength
field.description: Size of the entire Shapefile as stored in the Shapefile, in bytes.

field.name: shapeType
field.description: Type of the Shape records contained in the remainder of the Shapefile. Should match one of the constant values defined in the ShpType class.

field.name: version
field.description: Shapefile version. Expected value is 1000.

classRec.name: ShpRecord
classRec.description: The ShpPoint class parses an ESRI Shapefile Record Header from a ByteArray as well as its associated Shape Object. The parsed object is stored as a ShpObject that can be cast to a specialized ShpObject deriving class using the found shapeType value.

field.name: shape
field.description: Parsed Shape Object. Cast to the specialized ShpObject deriving class indicated by the shapeType property to obtain Shape type specific data.

field.name: shapeType
field.description: Type of the Shape Object associated with this Record Header. Should match one of the constant values defined in the ShpType class.

classRec.name: PlotLayer
classRec.description: A PlotLayer is a UIComponent that has a Bitmap child. The Bitmap child contains the graphics of an IPlotter.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: dispose
method.description: This is called by SessionManager.dispose().

method.name: getDynamicPlotter
method.description: The IPlotter object used to draw shapes on this PlotLayer.

method.name: handleSizeChange
method.description: This function gets called when the unscaled width or height changes. This function will resize the BitmapData to the new unscaled width and height. Classes that extend PlotLayer can override this function for different behavior.

method.name: init
method.description: This function gets called by the constructor. This code is in its own function because constructors do not get compiled.

method.name: invalidateGraphics
method.description: This function should be used instead of validateGraphics(), which should never be called directly. This will invalidate the graphics and cause validateGraphics() to be called at the appropriate time.

method.name: updateDisplayList
method.description: This function checks if the unscaled size of the UIComponent changed. If so, the graphics are invalidated. If the graphics are invalid, this function will call validateGraphics(). This is the only function that should call validateGraphics() directly.

method.name: validateGraphics
method.description: This function should be defined with override by classes that extend AbstractVisLayer. This function should never be called directly except by the protected updateDisplayList() function defined here.

method.name: graphicsAreValid
method.return: true if the graphics are valid.

method.name: plotter
method.description: IPlotLayer interface

method.name: selectionFilter
method.description: This will be used to filter the graphics that are drawn, but not the records that were used to calculate the graphics.

method.name: spatialIndex
method.description: This is used to index the keys in the plotter by dataBounds.

method.name: subsetFilter
method.description: This key set allows you to filter the records before they are used to calculate the graphics.

field.name: isOverlay
field.description: When this is true, the plot won't be drawn if there is no selection and the background will never be drawn. This variable says whether or not this is an overlay on top of another layer with the same plotter.

field.name: layerIsVisible
field.description: ets the visibility of the layer

method.description: This function checks if the unscaled size of the UIComponent changed. If so, the graphics are invalidated. If the graphics are invalid, this function will call validateGraphics(). This is the only function that should call validateGraphics() directly.

field.name: fullDataBounds
field.description: This is the collective data bounds of all the selectable plot layers.

method.description: This function should be called by a tool to initialize a probe line layer and its ProbeLinePlotter
method.param: xAxisToPlot set to true if xAxis needs a probe line and tooltip
yAxisToPlot set to true if yAxis needs a probe line and tooltip

method.description: This function orders the layers from top to bottom in this order: probe (probe lines), plot, yAxis, xAxis

yAxisToPlot set to true if yAxis needs a probe line and tooltip

classRec.name: AbstractColumnReference
classRec.description:
This is a base class for implementing an IColumnReference. This class should be extended and include all the information required to retrieve a column of data.
The implementation of getHashCode() uses the session state of this object to generate a hash code. When you extend AbstractColumnReference, you need to make sure that the session state contains all the properties required to differentiate one column reference from another.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: getDataSource
method.description: This function returns the IDataSource that knows how to get the column this object refers to.
method.return: The IDataSource that can be used to retrieve the column that this object refers to.

method.name: getHashCode
method.description: This is the hash code used to compare two IColumnReference objects for equality.

method.name: getMetadata
method.description: This function gets metadata associated with the column. For standard metadata property names, refer to the AttributeColumnMetadata class.
method.param: propertyName The name of the metadata property to retrieve.
method.result: The value of the specified metadata property.

method.name: invalidateHash
method.description: This function will invalidate the hash value of the IColumnReference object.

field.name: dataSourceName
field.description: This is the name of an IDataSource in the top level session state.

method.name: getMetadata
method.description: This function gets metadata associated with the column. For standard metadata property names, refer to the AttributeColumnMetadata class.
method.param: propertyName The name of the metadata property to retrieve.
method.result: The value of the specified metadata property.

field.name: metadata
field.description: This is the unstructured information used to request a column.

classRec.name: HierarchyColumnReference
classRec.description: This is a temporary solution for Weave 0.8. This class should be deleted later.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: getHashCode
method.description: This function generates a hash value containing a sorted list of names and values of the attributes of the leaf XML node in the hierarchyPath.

method.name: getMetadata
method.description: This function gets metadata associated with the column. For standard metadata property names, refer to the AttributeColumnMetadata class.
method.param: propertyName The name of the metadata property to retrieve.
method.result: The value of the specified metadata property.

classRec.name: AbstractDataSource
classRec.description: This is a base class to make it easier to develope a new class that implements IDataSource. To extend this class, the minimum functions to override are: initialize(), requestHierarchyFromSource() and requestColumnFromSource(). Optionally, initializationComplete() can also be overridden to control how long column requests are delayed.
classRec.author: adufilie

method.name: convertOldHierarchyFormat
method.description: For each tag matching tagName, replace attribute names of that tag using the nameMapping. Example usage: convertOldHierarchyFormat(root, 'attribute', {dataTableName: "dataTable", dataType: myFunction})
method.param: root The root XML hierachy tag.
tagName The name of tags that need to be converted from an old format.
nameMapping Maps attribute names to new attribute names or functions that convert the old values, with the following signature: function(value:String):String

method.name: debug
method.description: This function calls trace() using the given arguments if enableDebug is true.
method.param: traceArgs The arguments to pass to trace().

method.name: delayColumnRequest
method.description: delayColumnRequest This will put an initialized proxy column into the list of pending requests. It will also call initializeHierarchySubtree() for a subtree of the hierarchy, if a subtree is missing. This function can be overridden to have different behavior, but this definition is recommended.
method.param: request The request that needs to be handled.

method.name: dispose
method.description: dispose This function should be called when the IDataSource is no longer in use. All existing pointers to objects should be set to null so they can be garbage collected.

method.name: getAttributeColumn
method.description: This function creates a new ProxyColumn object corresponding to the columnReference and queues up the request for the column.
method.param: columnReference An object that contains all the information required to request the column from this IDataSource.
method.return: A ProxyColumn object that will be updated when the column data is ready.

method.name: handleAllPendingColumnRequests
method.description: handleAllPendingColumnRequests This function will call handlePendingColumnRequest() on each pending column request.

method.name: handleHierarchyChange
method.description: This function gets called when the hierarchy callbacks are run. This function can be defined with override by classes that extend AbstractDataSource.

method.name: handlePendingColumnRequest
method.description: handlePendingColumnRequest This function will call requestColumnFromSource() if the hierarchyPointer in the column is now valid. Otherwise, it will call delayColumnRequest() again. This function may be overridden by classes that extend AbstractDataSource. However, if the extending class decides it wants to call requestColumnFromSource() for the pending column, it is recommended to call super.handlePendingColumnRequest() instead.
method.param: request The request that needs to be handled.

method.name: handleUnsupportedColumnReference
method.description: Use this function to report an error for an unsupported column reference.
method.param: columnReference An object that contains all the information required to request the column from this IDataSource.
method.return: A ProxyColumn object that will be updated when the column data is ready.

method.name: initialize
method.description: This function must be implemented by classes that extend AbstractDataSource. It will be called the frame after the session state for the data source changes. When overriding this function, super.initialize() should be called.

method.name: initializeHierarchySubtree
method.description: initializeHierarchySubtree If the hierarchy subtree pointed to subtreeNode
method.param: subtreeNode A pointer to a node in the hierarchy representing the root of the subtree to request from the source.

method.name: requestColumnFromSource
method.description: requestHierarchyFromSource This function must be implemented by classes that extend AbstractDataSource. This function should make a request to the source to fill in the proxy column.
method.param: columnReference An object that contains all the information required to request the column from this IDataSource.
A ProxyColumn object that will be updated when the column data is ready.

method.name: requestHierarchyFromSource
method.description: requestHierarchyFromSource This function must be implemented by classes by extend AbstractDataSource. This function should make a request to the source to fill in the hierarchy at the given subtree. This function will only be called once per subtreeNode.
method.param: subtreeNode A pointer to a node in the hierarchy representing the root of the subtree to request from the source.

method.name: uninitialize
method.description: This function sets initialized to false.

method.name: attributeHierarchy
method.description: getAttributeHierarchy
method.return: An AttributeHierarchy object that will be updated when new pieces of the hierarchy are filled in.

method.name: initializationComplete
method.description: Classes that extend AbstractDataSource can define their own replacement for this function. All column requests will be delayed as long as this accessor function returns false. The default behavior is to return false during the time between a change in the session state and when initialize() is called.

field.name: _initializeCalled
field.description: This variable is set to false when the session state changes and true when initialize() is called.

field.name: _pendingColumnRequests
field.description: This is a list of DelayedColumnRequest objects.

field.name: _proxyColumnToReferenceMap
field.description: The keys in this Dictionary are ProxyColumn objects created by this data source. The values in this Dictionary are the corresponding IColumnReference objects. This dictionary uses strong keys to prevent garbage-collection.

field.name: _requestedHierarchySubtreeStringMap
field.description: _requestedHierarchySubtreeStringMap This maps a requested hierarchy subtree xml string to a value of true. If a subtree node has not been requested yet, it will not appear in this Object.

field.name: enableDebug
field.description: Set this to true to enable the debug() function.

field.name: url
field.description: url The url of the data source. This is included here because most IDataSource implementations will have a URL. It is a special case to have an IDataSource without one. It is recommended to lock this sessioned string in the initialize() function.

field.name: _attributeHierarchy

Check this box to group rather than stack the bars.
In stacked mode each segment representing a single record at a given attribute are placed together along a single bar, each segment representing a proportion of the entire bar length.
In grouped mode, each bar representing a single record at a given attribute are placed side-by-side.

method.name: columnSort
method.description: This function compares two DataGridColumn objects by comparing the dataField property. If Strings are given as parameters, it compares them directly. This compare function will put "name" in front of any other String.
method.param: a The first value to compare, either a DataGridColumn or a String.
b The second value to compare, either a DataGridColumn or a String.
method.return: A value of -1, 0, or 1, which is used by Array.sort().

method.name: loadData
method.description: this function loads the data into the grid.
method.param: is an array of arrays with all the data including the header
method.header: is array with the header values. This will be the order of columns in the grid.

method.name: loadXLSData
method.description: this function loads the data into the grid.
method.param: is an array of arrays with all the data including the header
method.header: is array with the header values. This will be the order of columns in the grid.

method.name: addTextAreaAndLabelToLocation
method.description: This function is called by ChangeWindows. This will add a Text Box to whatever parent has been indicated. If the container passed is not an ILinkableContainer the Text Box is automatically placed on the visdesktop.

method.name: getLinkableContainer
method.description: This function is passed a target and checks to see if the target is an ILinkableContainer. Either a ILinkableContainer or null will be returned.

method.name: getTextAreaFromTarget
method.description: This function is passed a target and checks to see if the target was a TextBox. Either a TextBox or null will be returned.

method.name: handleAddRemove
method.description: This function handles what occurs when an option in the context menu involving the Text Box tool is selected. It is linked to the Text Box tool options by the createContextMenuItems function.

method.name: removeWindows
method.description: This function is called when Remove is selected in the Context Menu. It checks for a TextArea, and if found will attempt to remove the TextArea and associated TextBox.

method.name: toggleUserControlPanel
method.description: This function is called when the user presses the tool button.
